title: Causation rise and fall witchcraft trials

content.question:
Directions: The suggested writing time for this question is 35 minutes. Make sure that you are best prepared to answer the question thoroughly in the time permitted. You should spend 5 minutes organizing or outlining your essay. In writing your essays, use specific examples to support your answer. If time permits when you finish writing, check your work.

Analyze at least TWO factors that account for the rise and TWO factors that explain the decline of witchcraft persecution and trials in Europe in the period from 1580 to 1750.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
